remarks.format: ## Remarks 當從刪除資料列控制項，後續的資料列的索引編號會降低補償。When rows are deleted from a control, the index numbers of subsequent rows are lowered to compensate. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
